name: Figure-4 Stretch
setup: Lie on back with both knees bent
Place right ankle on left thigh (figure-4 shape)
Keep right knee open to the side
Both hands ready to reach through
steps: Gently pull left leg toward chest
Keep right knee pressed away from you
Hold the stretch and breathe deeply
safety: Stretch should feel good, not painful. Back off if you feel pinching in hip or knee.

prescriptionHints.notes: Focus on deep breathing and relaxation

joints.notes: Should feel good stretch in outer hip. Avoid if knee or hip discomfort.
